trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供資料給<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare> event to provide custom sorting.
trans-unit.target: 您可以處理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>事件以提供自訂排序。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not set and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 只會發生此事件時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性未設定而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為`false`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataSource%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This event occurs once for each pair of cells in the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 發生此事件一次每一對排序的資料行中的資料格。

trans-unit.source: It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, or when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> overload.
trans-unit.target: 只有當使用者按一下資料行的標頭時，才發生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>，或當您呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName>多載。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Sort%28System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn%2CSystem.ComponentModel.ListSortDirection%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When this event occurs for a column with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>, you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 當發生此事件的資料行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性值為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>，您必須顯示排序圖像自行透過<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell.SortGlyphDirection%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個事件來排序資料列或多個資料行中有一個資料行使用資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>來比較資料格的值中指定的資料行中的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.Column%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> properties to access values in other columns through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A>屬性來存取透過其他資料行中的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Rows%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex2%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.RowIndex1%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The column to sort.
trans-unit.target: 若要排序資料行。

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第一個資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比較的第二個資料格的值。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the first cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含第一個資料格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含第二個資料格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 取得要比較之第一個儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue2%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the first cell.
trans-unit.target: 第一個儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 取得要比較之第二個儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用於搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSortCompareEventArgs.CellValue1%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the second cell.
trans-unit.target: 第二個儲存格的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the column being sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得要排序的資料行。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful in determining and controlling sort behavior in programmatic sorts.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是用於判斷並控制在以程式設計方式排序的排序行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"></xref> to sort.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn"> </xref>來排序。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the first cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含要比較的第一個資料格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，根據多個資料行的資料格值排序資料列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含第二個資料格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the row containing the second cell to compare.
trans-unit.target: 取得包含要比較的第二個資料格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: This property is useful when sorting rows based on the cell values in multiple columns.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性時，根據多個資料行的資料格值排序資料列。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row containing the second cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含第二個資料格的資料列索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the order in which the compared cells will be sorted.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出將排序比較的儲存格的順序。

trans-unit.source: Setting this value is typically the last operation you will perform in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個值通常是您將執行中的處理常式的最後一個作業<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You will typically set this value to the return value of a comparison method such as <xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 您通常會將此值設例如<xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的比較方法的傳回值

trans-unit.source: Less than zero if the first cell will be sorted before the second cell; zero if the first cell and second cell have equivalent values; greater than zero if the second cell will be sorted before the first cell.
trans-unit.target: 小於零，如果第一個資料格會排序的第二個儲存格; 之前第一個資料格和第二個資料格具有相等的值; 如果為零大於零，如果第一個資料格前，就會排序的第二個資料格。
